txt.en: 'Word from the Rohirrim captains is that we are pushing south! I am sure we will get separated, but perhaps we will fight together again upon this battlefield. Keep your wits about you, my friend!'
Bregdal can be found on the Field of Onslaught.\n\nYou should speak with Bregdal.
Bregdal can be found at Kings' End.\n\nYou should speak with Bregdal.
Defeat foes on the Field of Onslaught ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Speak with Bregdal when next you meet

'[placeholder], I wish we could meet again under more ideal conditions. The tone is grim here and our forces dwindle. You must have heard of Th√©oden King's passing. If misery has a face, it is surely this battle. Still, we press on.'
The Enemy can be found on the Field of Onslaught, upon the fields of Pelennor.\n\nDefeat foes on the Field of Onslaught.
'There are many of the Enemy encircling our hold on this ground. We must defeat some of them if we are to press on. Let us push through their numbers and break their rank!'
In the thick of battle upon the fields of Pelennor, Bregdal, Errand-rider of Gondor, hopes to assist you in any way he can.
